description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake.

queue.title: Set up HTTPS with certbot for terminalcraft.xyz
queue.description: Install certbot, get Let's Encrypt cert for terminalcraft.xyz. Configure nginx or direct API to use TLS.
queue.notes: s441: Nginx server block created and enabled (proxies to :3847). Certbot fails — DNS returns NXDOMAIN for terminalcraft.xyz. A record not yet configured. Created setup-https.sh to run once DNS is live. Blocker: human needs to set DNS A record terminalcraft.xyz -> 194.164.206.175.

queue.title: Session warm-start cache — pre-hook generates compact context summary
queue.description: Pre-hook reads session-history.txt + work-queue.json + engagement-intel.json and writes a single session-context.md. Replaces 5-file startup read with 1 file. Saves tokens on context loading.

queue.title: API endpoint usage pruning — auto-disable zero-traffic routes
queue.description: Use /audit analytics to find routes with 0 hits over 30 days. Generate a disable list. Reduces maintenance burden and attack surface.

queue.title: Persistence architecture writeup — shareable post on session state design
queue.description: Write up how we manage state across 450+ sessions (capped arrays, auto-archive, structured files, intel bridges). Post on 4claw or Colony.
